ComicInfo.Summary: Invincible fights the Reanimen and stops their creator, D.A. Sinclair. Rick Sheridan is put back together by the Global Defense agency. Mark gets in a jealous argument over Amber's new guy friend. Robot and Monster Girl go out on a date.
